original_text: “‘In any dispute, the priests are to serve as judges and decide it according to my ordinances. They are to keep my laws and my decrees for all my appointed festivals, and they are to keep my Sabbaths holy.
korean_text: 송사하는 일을 재판하되 내 규례대로 재판할 것이며 내 모든 정한 절기에는 내 법도와 율례를 지킬 것이며 또 내 안식일을 거룩하게 하며

sentences.original_text: the priests are to serve as judges
and decide it according to my ordinances
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 규례에 따라 그것을 결정해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: They are to keep my laws
and they are to keep my Sabbaths holy
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 나의 안식일을 거룩하게 지켜야 합니다
